end of days

Destiny Playbook

They say the Harbinger heralds the coming of evil and and end to all goodly things. But one has to wonder if the Harbinger themselves isn't partially at fault for that.

Requirements

To become the End of Days, you must earn the Fellowship of the Harbingers. This Destiny is only allowed in a game with the Overlord.

The End of Days is a Threat to the World, and starts with Are We Not The Same, You And I?

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-end-of-days.Item.YZCV5AYZTcGD4erq]{Are we not the same, you and I?}

Advancement

When you Level Up, choose one Advancement from either this list or from your Basic Playbook, then mark it. You may only choose each option once.

  • Take the Harbinger's Core Moves other than Doom and Gloom (Doomed Soul, Do Not Trifle With Wizards, and Wizardry). Your Doom stat is +2. If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
  • Take a Harbinger Custom.
  • Take an End of Days Custom.
  • Take an End of Days Custom.
  • Take an End of Days Custom.
